about_the_game:
Faustian Bargain has been fictionalized by using the stories of people who have been in the media or have experienced these events. It is designed to keep players in a constantly tense atmosphere. It tells the story of a man who dedicates his life to capturing and destroying the evil and cursed beings that haunt humans.

You make deals with some supernatural beings to save the humans invaded by demonic beings, and you fight the cursed beings using an ancient scripture that has not come to light. While you share the tragic stories of the victims in this rich story between dark and light, you will fight against evil beings and expel them from this world by solving the mind games they will make you experience.

  • Cinematic transitions with choices that will affect the course of the game.
  • Contains violence and brutality, not recommended for sensitive people. It is left to the player's own judgment.
  • Evil beings trying to kill you around every corner.
  • Different puzzles, different spells and items according to the story.
  • Different demonic entities and locations specific to the story.
  • Interactive in-game library with rich informative books on many religions, mythologies and ancient beliefs.
  • Headphones are *highly* recommended.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7, AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 280, ATI Radeon 4870 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Faustian Bargain, first-person horror game that brings a new and different twist to the thriller and survival-horror genres. After the Ouija sessions, immerse yourself in the tragedies of the victims and a story between reality and the supernatural. Play a hero whose life is between dark and light.
